name: Monster Battle
description: Monster Battle is a Hearthstone-inspired TCG style GameFi project, aiming to provide users with both an exciting game experience (by inheriting the delicate, intricate complexities in Hearthstone's game mechanics ) and means to monetize their gaming talents and finesse. Apart from Gamefi, we are also dedicated in builiding other key components of technological infrastructure essential in realizing a true metaverse, including DAO and Defi.
